text: Ojo onon, ki murtakiʙi ʙadiho sudand, pajomʙaronro duruƣ ʙarovardand va amri Parvardigorasonro muxolifat kardand va ƣajri Uro parastis kardand, gumon kardand, ki Mo onhoro dar sumori kasone, ki imon ʙa Alloh ovardaand va korhoi soista kardaand, qaror medihem? Va ojo zindagivu margason ʙaroʙar ast? Hargiz ʙaroʙar nestand! Ci ʙad dovari mekunand mijoni nekukoron va ʙadkoron dar oxirat
